detail_desc: Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Vest top in soft, cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and a rounded hem.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, concealed fastening and a zip in one side and a wide, asymmetric flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist, and flared hems. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short, two-strand necklace with one wide metal chain and one chain with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 40-49 cm.

Shirt in easy-iron premium cotton with a cut-away collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the narrow cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a lightweight, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a resort collar, French front and slits in the sides. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit with cut-out sections at the shoulders. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Straight-cut blouse in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and long wide sleeves with a button and flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Metal hoop earrings. Two different sizes: 4 cm and 7 cm.

Calf-length dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening with lacing at the top. Yoke at the back, long puff sleeves with decorative lacing at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted top in textured jersey with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Gathers on one shoulder and at the side to create a softly draped front. Lined.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is organic.
Boxy-style top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front and a large, frill-trimmed collar that continues to the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a slight puff over the shoulders and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an embroidered motif at the top. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, back pockets and straight legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and open sides with lacing.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, lined hood, high collar, zip down the front and side pockets . Lined.

Dress in an airy weave with covered elastication and a flounce at the neckline. Opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Thin metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and ties at the hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Round earrings in metal with circular pendants. The earrings are decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length approx. 7 cm.
Trousers in a cool linen and cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the top. Press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y) and narrow ribbing at the hems.
Patterned faux fur coat with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Sleeveless dresses in printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Hat in a soft rib knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, a low crotch and wide legs. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh panels. Regular waist with wide elastication and a key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in airy silk crêpe with concealed buttons down the front, a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with a covered button at the front, and a yoke with decorative gathers at the back. Long sleeves, frill-trimmed, gathered cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
V-neck silk top with narrow shoulder straps.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders and long dolman sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and modal blend with a high, ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide foldover panel at the waist and cuffed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in a soft blend of mulberry silk and cotton with a roll-edge hem.
Platform trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 5 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.

Gently fitted, padded parka in woven fabric with velvet details. Padded, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped front pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted straight jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly and button.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Satin playsuit with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a loose wrapover front with ties at one side.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Cotton jersey vest top with striped ribbing around the neckline and armholes and a mesh top layer with a print motif at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
